title: Measuring and quantifying the abiotic stress in the root environment
impactText: We used this ISI travel grant to develop common areas of interest with Prof Ren's group at CAU in Beijing. Since the visit we have been successful in winning a two year Royal Society exchange grant which started in 2013. Because of the ISIS grant we now have strong links with Prof Ren and we are looking for opportunities for more substantial funding. Agriculture, Food and Drink Societal,Economic
findingsText: We are currently writing a joint paper with Prof Ren's group which provides a soil-physical explanation of why different soil tillage systems give different yields. A Royal Society grant (2013-2015) Agriculture, Food and Drink
